nodes.text: The Tangled Grove was the name given to the region north of the Watchtower on the moon Oricon. The name came from the twisted and stunted trees that grew in the area despite the pools of lava scattered throughout and around the grove, and the forces of the Dread Masters—along with tentacles of the Bothrium Beast that lived within the Rooted Depths on the northern side of the grove—occupied the area during the Dread War.

The Tangled Grove was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of Game Update 2.4: The Dread War. It and the Rooted Depths are the site of the shared-faction story mission "Seeds of Dread" and the repeatable Daily version of that mission, "Dread Engines."
